SELECT TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'HH24:MI') MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER, TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') CHECK_TIME FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE WHERE
TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND MOVIE_NO = ${movieNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER

SELECT TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'HH24:MI') MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER, TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') CHECK_TIME FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE
WHERE MOVIE_TIME > SYSDATE
AND MOVIE_NO = ${movieNo} AND TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') = ${date} ORDER BY MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER
